backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report containing an empty feature list.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files and their functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint mounting the React root and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the app in TaskerProvider and renders AppLayout.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout switching between app sections and applying theme settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/SidebarNa: Sidebar navigation with mobile and desktop variants and section switching.
frontend/src/features/achievements/Achie: Displays weekly analytics, charts, and stats with empty-state handling.
frontend/src/features/achievements/compo: Recharts donut chart visualizing completed vs pending tasks.
Recharts bar chart showing daily task completion trends.
frontend/src/features/calendar/CalendarS: Calendar view for selecting dates and managing associated tasks.
frontend/src/features/calendar/component: Displays tasks for a selected day, showing progress, task list, and a form to add new tasks.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Shows an individual study day card with date, progress, collapsible task list, and a task form.
Provides a form for creating a task with subject, chapter, type, priority, rewards, and notes.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/Dashboar: Renders the main dashboard with study days, streak info, and controls for adding or resetting days.
frontend/src/features/pomodoro/PomodoroS: Implements a Pomodoro timer with mode switching, duration settings, and optional task linking.
frontend/src/features/settings/SettingsS: Offers settings for theme customization including dark mode, accent color, and background image options.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout actions, and loads or creates identities via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePersistedTaskerSta: Loads, normalizes, migrates, and persists tasker state in localStorage with validation of tasks and pomodoro settings.
frontend/src/hooks/usePomodoroTimer.ts: Manages a Pomodoro countdown timer, updates state each second, and logs task completions when focus sessions end.
frontend/src/hooks/useThemeSettings.ts: Applies theme preferences to the document, including dark mode, accent colors, and optional background images.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeeklyAnalytics.ts: Computes weekly task analytics including totals, daily stats, and subject breakdowns based on stored days.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes and layout styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app root and wraps it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/state/storageKeys.ts: Defines current and legacy localStorage keys for Tasker state.
frontend/src/state/TaskerProvider.tsx: Provides global tasker state, persistence, task management, pomodoro updates, and engagement streak handling.
frontend/src/state/taskerTypes.ts: Contains TypeScript types for tasks, study days, Pomodoro settings, theme settings, and subject chapter lists.
frontend/src/utils/id.ts: Generates unique task IDs using crypto.randomUUID or a timestamp-based fallback.
frontend/src/utils/storageKeys.ts: Duplicate storage key definitions for current and legacy Tasker state keys.
frontend/src/utils/taskerLogic.ts: Provides task sorting, day progress calculation, date utilities, and engagement streak logic.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom themes, colors, typography, animations, and plugin settings.
project_state.json: Describes project state, feature requests, known issues, and deployment goals for the app.
